aqntarvi BA#ti dEqvA aqgniM dhA#rayan draviNOqdAH || 
suqpaqrNO#&si gaqrutmA$n triqvRuttEq SirO# gAyaqtraM cakShuqH stOma# AqtmA 
sAma# tE taqnUrvA#madEqvyaM bRu#had-rathantaqrE paqkShau ya#j~jAyaqj~jiyaqM pucCaqM 
CandAq(gg)qsya~ggA#niq dhiShNi#yAH SaqPA yajU(gm)#Shiq nAma# || 
suqpaqrNO#&si gaqrutmAqn diva#M gacCaq suva#H pata || 42
(nABAq - vanEq yE - na#yAmiq - kShAmA# ruqkmO$ - &ShTAtri(gm)#Sacca) (A10)
